Dear friend, find comfort in knowing that no matter where you are in life, Father God, through Jesus Christ, knows every single thing about you and He loves you so much. God knows us thoroughly as we go through our daily lives at different locations and situations. He does not abandon us nor forget us; nor is He to busy that He neglects us. This amazing truth gives us such hope and assurance that we can praise our Lord Jesus, whom has carefully created us and leads us through life. (Psalm 139 : 1 - 14)
